name: EasyWifiAccess
short_description:
This application generates qr codes from your current Wifi profiles. It's compatible with Windows Vista, 7 and 8. Use the easywifiaccess android app to share your current pc wifi with your android mobile easily!.

summary: This app can recover wifi passwords and create qr codes automatically.
